description: Category type for describing an analysis.

analysis_steps.description: Analysis broken down into individual steps as defined by the researcher. List of analysis steps.

analysis_order.description: Order in which the above steps are performed. Analysis steps may be repeated here keeping the order intact.

analysis_code_repository.description: Path to the code repository containing the analysis scripts. List of strings.

similarto.description: If the analysis is similar to that described in other papers / repositories, the DOI of the relevant resource may be provided here.
